seo.title: Circularity EU27 — Municipal Waste (Eurostat)
seo.description: Dynamic story in 3 acts: where EU27 stands today, how it evolved, and what to do now. Official Eurostat data (env_wasmun).
h1.title: Circularity in the EU27 — explained in 3 acts
h1.sub: Automatically updates when Eurostat publishes a new year (env_wasmun).
intro.p1b: Each ton of municipal waste has three main destinations:
intro.targets.text: Recycle 65% and limit landfill to ≤10%. Anything not RCY/BIO moves us away from these goals.
intro.source: Source: Eurostat (env_wasmun – municipal waste management operations). Percentages = share of each operation in the total of the respective year and country.
legend.rcy.label: Recycling
legend.bio.label: Biowaste
legend.inc.label: Incineration
legend.lnd.label: Landfill
kpis.note: Base year chosen automatically (with minimum country coverage).
med.note: The composition of the median country shows how the flow is split: RCY/BIO vs LND/INC.
end.note: The smaller the bar, the more circular the system. The purple line shows the ≤10% landfill target (2035).
trend.note: Lines show % recycling over time. Top-5 highlighted; European target in purple.
conc.quick.1: Scale up biowaste with weekly measured collection.
conc.struct.1: Contracts with goals in pp/year of LND/INC diversion.
cit.src: Eurostat — Municipal waste by waste management operations (env_wasmun).
cit.lic: Content reused under Creative Commons BY 4.0, in accordance with Eurostat reuse notice. Logos and brands excluded.
cit.method: Percentages per country and year calculated as operation value / sum of operations in the same year. Grouping of operations into RCY (recycling), BIO (biowaste), INC (incineration) and LND (landfill); “Other” = remainder.
cit.targets: Municipal waste recycling 65% (Directive (EU) 2018/851); Landfilling ≤10% (Directive (EU) 2018/850). Purple lines in charts represent these targets.
cit.disclaimer: Eurostat/European Commission are not responsible for interpretations. Series may be revised.
cta.p: Collection, calculation and reporting of ESG handled by us. Official data, ready dashboards.

t.end.label: Landfill + Incineration

t.trend.note: Upward lines = progress. Top-5 of the base year highlighted. Purple line = target 65% in 2035.
